autorag.title: AutoRAG - Intelligent Search System
autorag.subtitle: Try our intelligent information retrieval system powered by Cloudflare AutoRAG. Index is automatically updated every 4 hours.

upload.title: Add Text to Knowledge Base
upload.description: Input text to add to the AutoRAG knowledge base. Added data is automatically indexed every 4 hours.
upload.textPlaceholder: e.g. Cloudflare is a cloud service that improves website and application performance, security, and reliability...

search.empty: Enter a question to start searching

weather.title: Weather Information - Cloudflare KV Cache Demo
weather.subtitle: Test the weather information caching functionality. First call fetches from API and caches in KV for 5 minutes.

form.cityPlaceholder: Enter city name (e.g. Tokyo, London, Paris)

info.title: How KV Cache Works:
points: Initial API call saves result to KV for 5 minutes
Subsequent requests for same city within 5 minutes return cached response
Use 'Clear Cache' button to force fetch new data
